title: ICYMI - D.L. Hughley on Racist Police Violence and "How Not to Get Shot"
itunes:title: ICYMI - D.L. Hughley on Racist Police Violence and "How Not to Get Shot"
description:
Comedian D.L. Hughley discusses "How Not to Get Shot," his book that examines white Americans' reactions to police shootings of unarmed black people.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
